title: Create FO-04 server actions for discovery
description:
Create server actions for calling the FO-04 discovery agent.

File to modify: app/fo-04/actions.ts

Create function: generateDynamicScreen(context: GatheringContext)

Input (GatheringContext):
- name: string
- familiarity: 'new' | 'some' | 'very'
- initialTopic: string
- exchanges: Array<{ question: string; answer: { text: string; selectedChips: string[] } }>
- screenNumber: number

Output (DynamicScreenResponse):
- reflectiveStatement: string
- question: string
- initialChips: string[]
- expandedChips: string[]
- readyForAffirmations: boolean

Include error handling that returns a structured error for UI retry.
acceptance_criteria: Server action can be imported and called; returns valid DynamicScreenResponse structure
